div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Meet Jayden Nadgwick! His school activities include Track and Field, Trap shooting, MHS, Student Council, Choir, Show Choir, Band, Jazz Band and art classes. His interests outside of school include......

div.p: Meet Zoe Keezer! Her school activities include MHS, Choir, Track, Basketball, Student Body Secretary, and MHS Student Rep. Her interests outside of school include helping others, reading, swimming,......
The Family Fair scheduled for April 15th has been canceled for this year. Kindergarten Round-Up for April 20th will be postponed until this fall sometime....

div.p:
I know our parents will be excited! Mrs. Jirava and Freddy show us how to make a Kazoo.
https://5il.co/fbxz

I know you all have been waiting patiently! Here is episode #2 of NCE teacher Cribs.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DOq4uF5cgTE&feature=youtu.be
I sat in on many video conferences today with staff members. I absolutely love how they advocate for each and every student at NCE. I sure am proud to be part of a great school district!
